title: Dynamic Laser System
description: This asset pack allows you to easily implement fully dynamic lasers into your project!
longDescription:
Demo Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ybMVPoAeV0w

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/13-mLdeFpm1RmAK65KxMb9k8ZsKHiNGLJA6nw8wZrk44/edit?usp=sharing

Discord support server: https://discord.gg/tGkjZUW


The Dynamic Laser System allows you to easily implement real-time lasers into your levels. Many different ways of customizing the behavior of lasers are implemented! (Check out the Demo!)


100% Blueprint


Please Note: The destructible spheres seen in the video are no longer supported in UE5+, as Apex Destruction has been deprecated. As this is only a decor for the video, I don't see any reason to migrate to Chaos right now.


This pack includes a variety of ways to modify lasers and you are met with 3 types of particle systems to customize (Beam, Bounce, and Hit), as well as light and sound options. The pack includes but is not limited to, 11 particle systems. Info on how to implement your own particle systems is covered in the documentation!


The documentation covers all of the features in detail, consider reading it!


If you experience any issues or have any questions that the documentation can't help with, please feel free to email me or ask on the Discord server. Even though it's been 5 years since this pack was released I'm still glad to help!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Add lasers to your levels instantly!
  • Event System (laser begin hit/laser end hit)
  • Deal Damage to Actors (damage/s)
  • Apply Force to Actors hit
  • Bounce on anything you want
  • Ignore any Actor you want
  • Update in realtime OR how often you want (Performance Mode!)
  • 3 Types of particle effects of your own choosing:
  1. Beam effect (Source/Target as "User Set")
  2. Bounce effect
  3. Hit effect
  • Play a Sound Cue where laser hits!
  • Easy-to-use Debug mode
  • Switch between simple/complex collision trace for better performance/results
  • Custom "LaserInteractable" Component allows for more control over individual Actors:
  1. Allow Bounce?
  2. Custom bounce location/direction (Instead of a reflection direction from impact Point)
  • Blueprint functionality:
  1. Set various settings realtime
  2. Get all actors hit by the laser
  • Receive Events


Number of Blueprints: 2 Main Blueprints for lasers (LaserEmitter and LaserInteractable) & 7 Additional for example usages!

Models: 2, Textures: (10) 256x256 - 1024x1024, Materials: 7 Particle Systems: 11 (4 beams, 7 hit/bounce)

Input: Keyboard, Mouse (R=Vanish, Shift=Sprint, Scroll=Zoom) Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
